item.title: Chicken Jockey Explained: A Minecraft Movie's Viral Scene & Why Audiences Are Being Kicked Out Of Theaters Over It
item.description: A Minecraft Movie has proven incredibly popular among general audiences, but one scene involving a Chicken Jockey is causing a quite particular stir.

item.title: The Predator Movie Everyone Always Wanted To See Is Finally Coming Out After 38 Years
item.description: With the upcoming Predator: Killer of Killers, the Predator franchise promises to finally give viewers the anthology movie we have wanted for years.
